revised_title: The Properties of Slat and its Relation to Iron Ores and Magnetism
tldr: The author discusses the properties of slat and its potential relation to iron ores and magnetism. They conducted experiments by calcining slat and found that it turns into a yellow ochre, which suggests that some yellow and orange-colored sediments found in fountains may come from slat rather than iron ores. The author also mentions their intention to further investigate the properties of slat and its reaction with magnetism.
